articles.description:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.

In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he’s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn’t done with the project. Instead, he’s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.
articles.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token

articles.author: Jake Simmons
articles.description:
Lucie (@LucieSHIB), the marketing lead for the Shiba Inu project, has confirmed the launch of the closed beta for the Shiba Eternity Web3 version. The game, which is built on the Shibarium network, aims to bring the collectible card game into the web3 with its migration to the Shibarium Layer-2 blockchain.
 
Loyal Shiba Inu Community Gets Exclusive Access
 
The Shiba Inu marketing lead disclosed a statement by Angel from the Shiba Eternity team that the closed beta is slated for release “this week.” The early version is poised to offer an exclusive gaming experience to those who are part of the Shiba Inu token ecosystem. Access to the beta requires players to stake LEASH tokens which can be done through Shibaswap. This staking requirement not only gatekeeps the entry into the game but also…
articles.title: Shiba Inu Web3 Game Launches Closed Beta: How To Gain Early Access

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Are you looking for the next big opportunity in the crypto world? If so, it’s time to pay attention to Cardano (ADA) and Mpeppe (MPEPE). These two tokens are not just grabbing headlines; they are set to create substantial wealth for savvy investors in 2024. Let’s delve into why these cryptocurrencies are being hailed as the wealth makers of the coming year.
 
The Potential of Cardano (ADA) 
The excitement around Cardano (ADA) is palpable, especially with the potential introduction of an ADA-ETF. Recently, Charles Hoskinson, the founder of Cardano, hinted at the possibility of an ADA-Spot ETF. This development could revolutionize the crypto market by making Cardano (ADA) more accessible to a broader audience and promoting greater market regulation. Kennedy Jr. has once again demonstrated his unwavering support for Bitcoin, emphasizing its importance in promoting financial freedom and economic resilience. His continued advocacy of the digital asset is evidence of his conviction in the revolutionary potential of cryptocurrencies.
 
Bitcoin To Drive Economic Recovery In The US
 
In the race to make Bitcoin a strategic reserve asset in the US, Kennedy Jr. asserted that Bitcoin would play a crucial role in restoring the nation’s economy. The presidential candidate made the daring statement in a recent interview with Coin Stories Podcast host Natalie Brunell.

articles.title: Bitcoin Will Play A Critical Role In Restoring US Economy, Kennedy Jr Says

articles.author: Nik Hoffman
articles.description:
In a significant legislative move, Russian lawmakers have passed a bill permitting businesses to use Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies in international trade, according to a report by Retuers. This development is part of Russia's strategy to circumvent Western sanctions imposed following the invasion of Ukraine. The new law, expected to take effect in September, aims to address delays in international payments, particularly with key trading partners like China, India, and the UAE.

JUST IN: 🇷🇺 Russian law makers passes bill allowing businesses to use #Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies in international trade — Reuters pic.twitter.com/yFExWcIG9k
— Bitcoin Magazine (@BitcoinMagazine) July 30, 2024
  
  
  
Central bank Governor Elvira Nabiullina, a proponent of the law, announced that the first…
articles.title: Russia Legalizes Bitcoin And Crypto for International Trade To Bypass Sanctions
